  source_group( "Platform Header Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    ../gucefCORE/src/CDVString.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/DVCPPOSWRAP.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/DVOSWRAP.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvcppstringutils.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvfileutils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvmd5utils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvstrutils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/md5.c
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_CMutex.cpp
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_CScopeMutex.cpp
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_dvmtoswrap.c
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_mutex.c
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN32" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

elseif (WIN64)
  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES 
    ../gucefCORE/include/CDVString.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/DVCPPOSWRAP.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/DVOSWRAP.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/dvcppstringutils.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/dvfileutils.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/dvmd5utils.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/dvstrutils.h
    ../gucefCORE/include/md5.h
    ../gucefMT/include/gucefMT_CMutex.h
    ../gucefMT/include/gucefMT_CScopeMutex.h
    ../gucefMT/include/gucefMT_dvmtoswrap.h
    ../gucefMT/include/gucefMT_mutex.h
  )

  set( PLATFORM_HEADER_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Header Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    ../gucefCORE/src/CDVString.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/DVCPPOSWRAP.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/DVOSWRAP.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvcppstringutils.cpp
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvfileutils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvmd5utils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/dvstrutils.c
    ../gucefCORE/src/md5.c
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_CMutex.cpp
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_CScopeMutex.cpp
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_dvmtoswrap.c
    ../gucefMT/src/gucefMT_mutex.c
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "gucefLOADER" )
add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_CORE_EMBED_CODE;GUCEF_LOADER_BUILD_MODULE;GUCEF_MT_EMBED_CODE;GUCEF_NO_LOGGING" )

if ( ANDROID )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dl log )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( LINUX32 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dl rt )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dl rt )
endif( LINUX64 )

if ( WIN32 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} Ws2_32.lib winmm.lib )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} Ws2_32.lib winmm.lib )
endif( WIN64 )

include_directories( .. ../../common/include ../gucefCORE ../gucefCORE/include ../gucefMT ../gucefMT/include ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ include )

if ( ANDROID )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/android ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( EMSCRIPTEN )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( EMSCRIPTEN )

if ( GLX )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( GLX )

if ( GTK )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( GTK )

if ( IOS )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( IOS )

if ( LINUX32 )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/linux ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/linux ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( LINUX64 )

if ( NACL )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( NACL )

if ( OSX )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( OSX )

if ( POSIX )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( POSIX )

if ( SDL )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( SDL )

if ( SYMBIAN )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( SYMBIAN )

if ( UNIX )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( UNIX )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/mswin ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../gucefCORE/include/mswin ../gucefCORE/include/ ../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( WIN64 )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********

GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (EMSCRIPTEN)

elseif (GLX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (GTK)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (IOS)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (LINUX32)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (LINUX64)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (NACL)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (OSX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (POSIX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (SDL)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (SYMBIAN)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (UNIX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN32)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN64)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
else()
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()
